In 2018, the MoHFW launched the Anemia Mukt Bharat (AMB) strategy to reduce the anemia prevalence in six 
target age groups, namely children 6-59 months, children 5-9 years, adolescents 10-19 years, pregnant women, 
lactating women and women of reproductive age (15-49 years). The strategy adopts a multi-pronged 6x6x6 
approach to address both nutritional and non-nutritional anaemia through continuum of c
